item.title: VMware Microsites You should bookmark
item.description: The idea behind this post was born as follows: Me: …it´s on vSphere Central. Customer: On which site? Me: vSphere Central! Never heard of it? Customer: I know Storagehub, but I´ve never heard of vSphere Central. This is basically how the conversation went and I told him and my TAM peer Tina, she was with me on the session, that I will provide a collection of the VMware Microsites I know, together at one point.
